alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake Valley; Utah Valley; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 5:38PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Wasatch...central Salt Lake...southeastern Davis and north central Utah Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 538 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from South Jordan to near Springville. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Provo, Sandy, Murray, Bountiful, West Jordan, Orem, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Lehi, Draper, Riverton, Pleasant Grove, Cottonwood Heights, Springville, Midvale, Holladay, American Fork and South Salt Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 267 and 307. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 123 and 133. US Route 40 between mile markers 23 and 25, and near mile marker 28. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
